Class PlayerSingleton

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class PlayerSingleton
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for the player Ensures consistency of player state and makes setting and getting player info more reliable

    1.0
    Author:
    Eddie Eldridge
